title: Arvi Puka
text: I make chemical systems work better.  Experienced in academic and industry contract research in biological and medicinal chemistry with a strong record of innovation. Currently pursuing a master of engineering degree in materials science and engineering at the University of Toronto with a special interest in advanced soft materials and entrepreneurship.
